name: Cheat Book
description:
CHEAT BOOK

A platformer game made for the WGJ #105 'Cheat To Win'.

Controls :  

Right/Left Arrow - Movement

Space - Jump

B - Open/Close Cheat Book

Credits -  Huge thanks to this awesome people who sharing their beautiful art under CC0 License

Adventurer by rvros - https://rvros.itch.io/animated-pixel-hero
Dungeon Pack by bakudas - https://bakudas.itch.io/generic-dungeon-pack
Dungeon Ambiance by yd - https://opengameart.org/content/dungeon-ambience
Wise Man by Thalmus - https://opengameart.org/content/old-man
Norse Font by Joel Carrouche - https://www.fontspace.com/joel-carrouche/norse
